text:
Is Keith Urban actually upset about Nicole Kidman ’s friendship with Colin Farrell ? One of this week’s new tabloids claims the country star isn’t happy about the bond between his wife and the actor, who co-starred together in two movies this year. Gossip Cop, however, can exclusively set the record straight. Kidman and Farrell recently worked […]
